channel.title: Odin - Making a better future, in the future
channel.description:
[size=6pt]If you would like to apply, click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,554796.0.html]here[/url][/size] [img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w444/OdinSource/Odinlogo.png[/img]
[b]Introduction[/b] This source is not a remake, it is an attempt to make a better server for other people to play. I intend this server to be developed at the maximum level, and a group of programmers is better then none. This is a 474 server, similar to a PI(not loading 500+ though). I picked this revision so that we had a little more room to work with(rather then a 317 or a Deltascape server) while still maintaining the old-style graphics.
[b]Content[/b] Green = Completed Blue = In progress Red = Not started
[img]http://tinyurl.com/Odinmagicicon[/img][size=12pt]Magic[/size][img]http://tinyurl.com/Odinmagicicon[/img]
[b]Normal spellbook[/b] Combat spells Reducing spells God spells Alchemy spells Correct teleport animation Telegrabbing Enchantment spells Correct teleports Bones to spells Teleother spells
[img]http://tinyurl.com/FletchIconodi[/img][size=12pt]Fletching[/size][img]http://tinyurl.com/FletchIconodi[/img] Bows Arrows Crossbows Darts Bolts Gem bolts
[img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w444/OdinSource/SymbolSkill3Herblore.png[/img][size=12pt]Herblore[/size][img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w444/OdinSource/SymbolSkill3Herblore.png[/img] All herbs cleanable All unfinished potions All potions can be made *To be expanded*
[b]Media[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HG8OWlKfZHA&feature=plcp[/youtube] [img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w444/OdinSource/Telegrabs.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56QK8cQ_3S0&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

item.title: Odin - Making a better future, in the future
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[size=6pt]If you would like to apply, click here[/size]

Introduction
This source is not a remake, it is an attempt to make a better server for other people to play. I intend this server to be developed at the maximum level, and a group of programmers is better then none. This is a 474 server, similar to a PI(not loading 500+ though). I picked this revision so that we had a little more room to work with(rather then a 317 or a Deltascape server) while still maintaining the old-style graphics.

Content
Green = Completed
Blue = In progress
Red = Not started

[size=12pt]Magic[/size]

Normal spellbook
Combat spells
Reducing spells
God spells
Alchemy spells
Correct teleport animation
Telegrabbing
Enchantment spells
Correct teleports
Bones to spells
Teleother spells

[size=12pt]Fletching[/size]
Bows
Arrows
Crossbows
Darts
Bolts
Gem bolts

[size=12pt]Herblore[/size]
All herbs cleanable
All unfinished potions
All potions can be made
To be expanded

Media
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HG8OWlKfZHA&feature=plcp[/youtube]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56QK8cQ_3S0&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

Read full topic
